snippet: The National Court announced Friday that it had ordered Hussein Salem, a former Egyptian army and intelligence officer, to be extradited to Egypt along with his son.
abstract: Spain's National Court orders former Egyptian army officer Hussein Salem to be extradited to Egypt along with his son Khaled Salem, who were both arrested with an associate in Madrid; Salem is accused of having been given lucrative deals because of his close ties to ousted Egyptian Pres Hosni Mubarak.
lead_paragraph: The National Court announced Friday that it had ordered Hussein Salem, a former Egyptian army and intelligence officer, to be extradited to Egypt along with his son.

headline.main: Spain: Court Orders Mubarak Associate to Face Corruption Charges in Egypt
headline.print_headline: Spain: Court Orders Mubarak Associate To Face Corruption Charges in Egypt
